2. [Upper Valley] This Week! Holiday Open House - handcrafted jewelry!!!
From: Deborah Sleeper <debs4546@icloud.com>
Date: Mon, 03 Nov 2014 07:27:01 -0500

Join us on Thursday, November 6th, for our annual holiday Open House for The Sparkling Flamingo handcrafted jewelry.  Find something for all the ladies on your shopping list, with handmade earrings starting at just $5.00!  There will be lots of "show only" specials, so be sure to stop by!  We will be at the Bradford Community Center (where Wallace Auction Services is, behind the Bradford Vet Clinic), from 4-8pm.  The building is past Farm Way, same side of the road.

Also,  if you book a home party during the open house, you will get an EXTRA $50 worth of hostess benefits!!

Deb Sleeper
The Sparkling Flamingo
